channel.title: Help with Item speed and max attack
channel.description:
I'm using client 314
and im trying 2 change the attack speed of weapons (make faster) such as ss and also the speed a shortbow shoots arrows..
also i want 2 change the max hit of ags. things like that.. I know its somewhere in client.java.. but i can't find it...
Ive searched the forums and many people have asked this question and many where not answered.. most of the posts are from a long time ago..
Please help.. greatly appreciated..

item.title: Help with Item speed and max attack

@phillip7112 wrote:

yes thank u i figured it out already…

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Item speed and max attack

item.title: Help with Item speed and max attack
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

Here’s a simple way of what Czar y2k said.

Step 1.
Go online on your server, wield the weapon that you’re changing the stats on. Look at it’s equipment stats.

Step 2.
Open up your Item.cfg (usually in the file named “Config”. If it isn’t, just search for it). Find the item you want to change (You can use Control+F, to open up a Finding box, comes in handy HEAPS).

Step 3. Look at the columns, then look at the equipment stats on your server. Then this makes it easier to change.
EXAMPLE:
(SERVER) Strength Bonus: 14.
(ITEM.CFG) Dragon_Dagger 1891941 1891891941 819489 48948918 _______ ________ ___________ ________ ________ 14.

You would change the 14 in your ITEM.CFG to what you would like the strength bonus to be, get me?
That’s pretty much it. Save, and compile, and you’re done!

Hope it helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Item speed and max attack

item.title: Help with Item speed and max attack
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

changing the max hit of a weapon is easy. just go to “item.cfg” and raise the stats of said weapon.
